snippet.title: Eight Dragons Release Trailer
snippet.description:
It's finally launched! It took us nearly two years longer than originally planned, but there's a lot more in it too. And it really is an excellent beat-'em-up - We think the gameplay is better than the side-scrollers you remember. No joke! Go buy the game!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/716250/Eight_Dragons/
